other_tests.findings: Onion bulbs and loss of myelinated fibers, without inflammatory infiltrates.
Increased protein content (82 mg/dL) with normal cell count; oligoclonal IgG bands restricted to CSF detected.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Marked prolongation of P100 wave latency during later evaluation.

other_tests.date: Initial - Not specified; Follow-up - 3 years later
other_tests.findings: Multiple T2-hyperintense lesions in the pons, paraventricular region, and corpus callosum without gadolinium enhancement initially; increased T2-lesion load and one gadolinium-enhancing lesion in the pons at follow-up.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased T2-lesion load and appearance of gadolinium-enhancing lesion.

other_tests.findings: Moderate loss of myelinated fibers and multi-layered onion bulbs.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Resolved within 2 hours after administration of Parkinson's medications.

other_tests.findings: Confirmed Herpes Simplex Encephalitis via HSV PCR.
Increased perfusion in the right temporo-parieto-occipital area during seizure.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Interictal SPECT showed localized hypoperfusion in the same area.
